content: In the European market which includes the Med, where the majority of the fleet of PSVs, we were able to push rates for new contracts awarded in Q2 2022 across all sizes of assets in the region by nearly 40% compared to Q1 2022 to an average new leading day rate in excess of $17,000 per day across all vessel classes which compares favorably to the Clarksons global OSV rate index which saw only an 18% rise in the first half of 2022.
